seg.output: Since I can hardly be present at the appointed hour - for it is not allowed to be in two places at once, unless I make a certain Lutheran body - I wanted to remind you, dear brother, not to subscribe to any of the ministers of the word's ceremonies and laws. If you cannot oppose and the Senate continues to make ecclesiastical laws, we will have to pretend and bear it, as long as we are not the authors. It will be easier for it to fall, which would not happen if it were taken by the authority of the religion's leaders. It is too much that each kind of religion intrudes and more work is spent on abolishing than on establishing. We tenaciously defend what our reason has found. Consider with what kind of show the entire papal apparatus has intruded into the Church of Christ, and how much business it has given and still gives. Farewell. Your Lion to his Bullingero.
